name: Muhammad Rafi Fatihul Ihsan
title: Fullstack Developer ‚Üí AI/ML Engineer

about.heading:
The Systems-Driven
Approach to AI
paragraphs: I am a Full-Stack Developer (MERN Stack) transitioning into AI Engineering. My experience building production-ready apps ‚Äî from a government-commissioned cultural platform to housing finance systems ‚Äî taught me that real impact happens when robust architecture meets practical implementation.

My background in MySQL, Express, React, and Node.js shapes how I approach AI: I understand data pipelines through database design, model serving through APIs, and scalability through distributed systems.
Currently, I'm building ML models in Python and integrating them into full-stack applications ‚Äî ensuring they are engineered to scale, not just operate in isolation.

contactSubtext: Open to roles at the intersection of production-ready engineering and intelligent systems. Whether you're a technical recruiter, founder, or fellow engineer ‚Äî let's connect.
